about_the_game:
The original soundtrack for Nocked! True Tales of Robin Hood, composed by Ivan Oberholster and performed by Ivan Oberholster, Eric Lewis-Baker, and Salva Zaca. Includes the traditional Bruremarsj fra Valsoeyfjord, with Scandinavian fiddler Paul Carlson; and a special bonus track, the previously unrecorded "Living in the Greenwood" by Jon Boden (of Bellowhead and the Remnant Kings).

Soundtrack files are available as .m4a and as .wav.
detailed_description:
The original soundtrack for Nocked! True Tales of Robin Hood, composed by Ivan Oberholster and performed by Ivan Oberholster, Eric Lewis-Baker, and Salva Zaca. Includes the traditional Bruremarsj fra Valsoeyfjord, with Scandinavian fiddler Paul Carlson; and a special bonus track, the previously unrecorded "Living in the Greenwood" by Jon Boden (of Bellowhead and the Remnant Kings).

Soundtrack files are available as .m4a and as .wav.
